summary: May 12 is the 132nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
William Francis Giauque  was an American chemist and Nobel laureate recognized in 1949 for his studies in the properties of matter at temperatures close to absolute zero. He spent virtually all of his educational and professional career at the University of California, Berkeley.
^ The Columbia Electronic Encyclopedia, 2004.
title: William Giauque
